Class CSSSelectorCondition

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class CSSSelectorCondition
extends SourceLocation
implements ICSSSelectorCondition
    Implementation for CSS conditional selector.

        public String getValue()
        Description copied from interface: ICSSSelectorCondition
